1936.HK.summary: Ritamix Global Limited, an investment holding company, distributes animal feed additives and human food ingredients in Malaysia and internationally. It offers animal feed products, such as amino acids, vitamins, minerals, enzymes, and phytogenic ingredients; and human food ingredients, including baking soda, minerals, hydrocolloids, emulsifiers, and vitamins It also produces animal feed additives premixes, which include vitamin premix, mineral premix, and enzyme premix, as well as customized services to its customers by formulating premixes with specific dosage and combination of ingredients. In addition, the company offers feed nutrition, formulations, and veterinary consultation services, as well as veterinarian technical support. It supplies its products to feed mills, farms, veterinarian clinics, pet shops, and related industries, as well as food and beverage sector. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia.

BEW.SI.summary: JB Foods Limited, an investment holding company, produces and sells cocoa ingredient products. The company offers cocoa butter, powder, liquor, and cake products. It also procures, markets, and sells cocoa beans and ingredients, and related products, as well as raw materials; and manufactures chocolate and sugar, as well as leases properties. JB Foods Limited sells its products to trade houses and end users, such as food and beverage, and confectionery manufacturers under the JB COCOA brand in North and South America, Asia, Europe, and other countries. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Gelang Patah, Malaysia. JB Foods Limited is a subsidiary of JB Cocoa Group Sdn Bhd.

DQWS.summary: DSwiss, Inc., a biotech-nutraceutical company, supplies health and beauty products in Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, Hong Kong, and China. Its products include DSwiss coffee for digestive health; DSwiss kiwi, which helps the body's immune system, as well as enhances skin complexion, reduces blood pressure, and prevents heart disease and stroke; DSwiss Triple SC that focusses on stem cells; DSwiss silk mask, a mask for dry, damaged, and sensitive skin; DSwiss coffee slimming scrub, a natural body scrub for removing dirt on the skin layers; DSwiss peppermint slimming gel, a cooling agent which brings a cooling and refreshing feeling to the body; DSwiss new age essence for younger and healthy-looking skin; and DSwiss enlighten essence (EE) cream, a light and nourishing cream. The company also provides DSwiss BioSpec, a medical eye-wear; Genmune-Pro, a product that helps the human's immunity system through enhancing the digestive health; Yumeka hair shampoo and conditoner; GenCell Biotech new age essence, a ready-to-use multi-effect skin care product; GenCell Biotech EE cream, a luminous white cream; and GenCell skin care travel pack. In addition, it offers DSwiss quantum magnetic analyzer, an equipment that reads and analyzes body energy field to test the health status and suggest recommendations; and AI skin analyzer machine, a facial camera for facial skin image data, as well as turnkey private label manufacturing service. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

IGSC.summary: IGS Capital Group Limited, through its subsidiary, IGS Mart SDN BHD, operates a convenient store in Malaysia. It operates its store under the Like Mart name. The company was formerly known as Sancon Resources Recovery, Inc. and changed its name to IGS Capital Group Limited in June 2017. The company is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia. IGS Capital Group Limited is a subsidiary of Pontoon Boat Inc.

NSLYF.summary: NestlÃ© (Malaysia) Berhad manufactures and sells food and beverage products in Malaysia and internationally. The company offers ice-cream, powdered milk and drinks, liquid milk and juices, instant coffee and other beverages, chocolate confectionery products, instant noodles, culinary products, cereals, yogurt, and related products. It also provides dairy and food, ready-to-drink, maternal and child nutrition, healthcare nutrition, and out-of-home products. The company was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia. NestlÃ© (Malaysia) Berhad is a subsidiary of NestlÃ© S.A.
